caption: The photograph depicts a large message board sign that is part of what appears to be a gas station or similar establishment. The sign has a bold red frame and features a white background with black text composed of changeable letters. The text on the sign reads: "FUEL SHORTAGE IS GOING TO GET THE WORLD BACK ON ITS FEET." Above the message board, there is a symbol shaped like a dollar sign ($), also in red, mounted on the top center of the sign. The backdrop of the image is a clear sky with a hint of cloud, suggesting that the photograph was taken on a day with good weather conditions. The overall visual emphasis is on the message conveyed by the sign, suggesting a commentary on the economic or social impact of a fuel shortage. The photograph is taken from a perspective that focuses solely on the sign and the immediate sky behind it, without any distractions from the surrounding environment.
title: The energy crisis in the states of Oregon and Washington resulted in attempts at humor by businesses with darkened signs such as this one in vancouver, Washington
